{"step_by_step_thinking": "Osteopenia is defined as a bone mineral density that is lower than normal but not low enough to be classified as osteoporosis. This is typically represented by a T-score between -1.0 and -2.5 on a DEXA scan. Therefore, the patient's T-score must fall within this range.", "answer_choice": "D. T-score of -1.6"}
